<VirtualHost *:80>
        ServerAdmin sam@vicensvivesdigital.com
        ServerName router.local
        DocumentRoot /Users/rtb/Sites/farm/farm-router
        DirectoryIndex index.html
        <Directory /Users/rtb/Sites/farm/farm-router>
                Options Indexes FollowSymLinks MultiViews
                AllowOverride All
                Require all granted
        </Directory>
        ErrorLog /private/var/log/apache2/router.local-error.log
        LogLevel warn
</VirtualHost>
